attributes.action: Demand the immediate release of Gillian Gibbons and stop all aid to Sudan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gillian Gibbons does not deserve to be in prison for insulting the Prophet Mohammed. Before any aid be sent to Sudan, they should be forced to apologise to her publically and improve their appaling human rights record.

rejection.details: This petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
